mapper.select: select e.id, e.ename, e.email, e.gender, e.birthday, e.did, dname from employee e left join department d on d.id = e.did
select e.id, e.ename, e.email, e.gender, e.birthday, e.did, dname from employee e left join department d on d.id = e.did where e.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into employee (ename, email, gender, birthday, did) VALUES (#{ename}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{did})
